replies.body:
Oh hey Woad Scout Quinn. But I want this skin for her instead: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/JOeeFePR-project-quinn-skin-idea


But on to the story:


{{champion:41}} So you wish to be a pirate? You are old and it seems like you have trouble moving. What can you do?

{{champion:50}} I can turn into a bird. 

{{champion:41}} I don't see how that is useful. Sure you can be on someone shoulder but that is not really needed to be a pirate. 

{{champion:50}}  _transform_

{{champion:41}} QITHQEIWERGHJWEFNQSJWEOFBWIBEFPOQJEFBFQ!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

{{champion:50}} **Still think this isn't useful?**

{{champion:41}} It's useful! It's useful! Just please change back. 

{{champion:50}} _transform_

{{champion:41}} _deep breathing_ Ok....you are in. Excuse me for a bit guys I will be right back. 

{{champion:18}} Wonder where he his going? 

{{champion:9}} Swain really scared him. 

{{champion:68}} Didn't scare me. 

{{champion:9}} Yes he did. I can smell fear. The only one that wasn't scare was Katerina. 

{{champion:55}} I'm used to seeing it. 

{{champion:50}} Wonder how long we have to wait. 

{{champion:9}} A while. 

{{champion:68}} How do you know?

{{champion:9}} Let's just say it wasn't only fear I smelled from him.

Hey I love the skin idea
I play {{champion:133}} and I know how she needs some sweg in her skins, that idea seems perfect, and i love the color combonations, i also like how valor looks. Great idea and i would love to see riot make it happen

{{champion:41}} QITHQEIWERGHJWEFNQSJWEOFBWIBEFPOQJEFBFQ!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I didn't know Gankplank talked like Gnar :)
Fear does that to people.
Is that the sound of him eating oranges to be k?

I was just browsing around that Chinese website and I found this 
http://lol.qq.com/act/a20141103design/works_detail.shtml?id=440
can be a Project:Fiora
Damn Chinese op
And there it is. the Project: Fiora
That skin is a reference from Zero in Borderlands. Look at Zero. It looks exactly like him. Numbers coming from his face and that blue sword. And in Borderlands Zero is a god and this skin is too.

The Chinese description says that the number on her mask will increase by 1 when she kills an enemy. It won't get to 5 unless she gets a pentakill..... And her taunts and laughs will interact with her mask as well.
omfg look at the shyvana skin on the side. Matter of fact look at all those skins :OO
Indeed. But if we had to choose between the 2, I would pick Quinn.

This is great.  It even coincides with Bilgewater Swain being on sale.  Too bad this is the only time that will happen.  Swain is the only one to have a pirate skin on sale in July.

[http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/july-sales-schedule](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/july-sales-schedule)
eat an orange to make it k
You should give Miss Fortune a team with Fiora, Leona or Riven, Quinn, Morgana, Zyra, Nami, Janna, or Karma, Evelynn, Diana, Elise, or Nidalee,
i dont get it...
so did {{champion:41}} piss his pants or poop in them
Best thing I've woken up to yet. 10/10

A Flaw in the Code Part 5
Come one, come all. Summoners please hear.
The truth about Riot is finally clear.
Bur first to understand, realize, comprehend.
I must say the beginning, middle, then end

Our heroes reached Worlds, they sat in the stands
By far, they were League's most unhappiest fans
They looked for real champions but to their dismay
The champs were well hidden among the cosplays

The group stayed alert and surveyed all around
They nervously awaited for Ryze's showdown.
A blue glow was noticed by one of the four
She led them to where it poured out from- a door

They all thought "Inside's where the champs ought to be"
But all that they found was a gaming PC
The PC displayed a League loading screen
The friends saw the worst sight that they'd ever seen

They'd always have nightmares, right up to their ends
Of who they saw that day on the Rift-their friend
And just like {{champion:32}} the group stars to wail
My friend, I will see you next Summoner's Sale
As always, previous parts are in previous sales
Cant wait for Lightdragon story :D
dragoon.
Do you occasionally jump very high and then fall back on the head of your enemies with a spear? ummm why does this sound familiar?{{champion:80}}
That sounds so much like a reference to Kain from Final Fantasy IV.  And you're right, his jump ability is very similar to Pantheon's ult.
I know i'm catching up late on comments but yes it was a reference to Kain. Thank you :)
No I occasionally gain wings and armor through a transformation that allows me to use magic and summon dragons so I can fight these giant white monsters that want to end life.
so this time it's a Tyson and Dragoon reference from Beyblade unlike last time it was yugioh 5ds, lol

Are you sure you don't operate quadrupedal assault vehicles that annoyingly destroy all of my Ultralisks with obnoxious efficiency?

[http://starofthelost.files.wordpress.com/2009/11/dragoon_micro_1.jpg](http://starofthelost.files.wordpress.com/2009/11/dragoon_micro_1.jpg)

No. Sometimes I spin a top so fast that a dragon comes out of it.

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/beyblade/images/e/ea/Takao_dragoon.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20110301175108
